nodes.text: Vixxon's Shear was the name of a rock outcropping in the southwestern corner of the Alien Gangland, a region in the southern reaches of the High Security Section on the planet Belsavis. During the battle on Belsavis during the Galactic War, the Sith Empire established the Imperial Domination Outpost atop the Shear.

Vixxon's Shear first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, but was only named in the list of medcenter names; if an Imperial player dies in the vicinity of the Domination Outpost, the Respawn at Medcenter option will identify the outcropping.
